entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
